testsuite.name: LoginPage.test

testcase.name: Verify "Go1Percent" logo, carousel images, carousel caption and the footer message should be displayed on login page
Verify carousel image changes when clicking on carousel buttons
Verify that specific text is present between login options on the web page
Verify that login page heading contains text "Sign in to Go 1%"
Verify that clicking on the Microsoft logo redirects to the Microsoft login page
Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and an alert message is displayed
Verify successful login with valid credentials
Verify remember me checkbox is selected during login

error.message: An error occurred while running .click() command on <Element [name=@loginButton]>: Timed out while waiting for element "#kc-login" with "css selector" to be present for 5000 milliseconds.

testcase.name: Verify the forgot Password functionality

failure.message: Expected element @forgotPasswordLink <a[tabindex="5"]> text to equal: "Forgot Password?" - element was not found - expected "equal 'Forgot Password?'" but got: "not present" (5254ms)

error.message: Unable to locate element: a[tabindex="5"] using css selector

testcase.error: NoSuchElementError: Unable to locate element: a[tabindex="5"] using css selector at throwDecodedError (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/nightwatch/node_modules/selenium-webdriver/lib/error.js:524:15) at ChromeDriver.handleErrorResponse (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/nightwatch/lib/transport/selenium-webdriver/index.js:400:7) at TransportActions.makeResult (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/nightwatch/lib/transport/selenium-webdriver/actions.js:85:20) at Object.locateMultipleElements (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/nightwatch/lib/transport/selenium-webdriver/actions.js:71:21) at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5) at async LocateElement.findElement (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/nightwatch/lib/element/locator.js:167:20)

testcase.name: Verify clicking on the "Terms of Use" link opens a new page with the terms of use
